taskGenerator

Class Task

  • java.lang.Object
    • taskGenerator.Task
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class Task
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    This class generates the data input by the user and turns it into a task object. This task object contains various information such as the event title, event date and the importance level.
    Version:
    0.5
    Author:
    Shawn
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      • equals

        public boolean equals(java.lang.Object obj)
        Checks if the 1 variable in the task object is equal to the same variable in another task object. Variables can be in the form of the date, time, title, importance.
        Overrides:
        equals in class java.lang.Object
